m_szDocSumamry: Directory:Electromagnetic See also News:Electromagnetic Directory of electromagnetic energy generation modalities, in which more energy emerges than was put into the system (over unity), harvesting energy from some external source, usually unseen.  Also covering super efficient methods. Contents Feature : Electrolysis > Hydrogen / Electromagnetic > Hydroxy Gen and OU Replications - Michael Couch writes about the many self charging battery system videos of various origins; Bedini, Tesla Switch, SEC, and others showing up all over Youtube. 100% 'Looped' Hydroxy Genset, Kapanadze OU and Self Char
